name: Fire Genasi
description: Fire genasi are descended from efreet, the genies of the Elemental Plane of Fire. They are often passionate and quick-tempered, with a connection to flame.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Fire Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Reach to the Blaze
traits.description: You know the Produce Flame cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast Burning Hands once as a 1st-level spell. You regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
